imdb.title: Tensei shitara ken deshita
imdb.plot: The hero of Tensei shitara Ken deshita differs from your standard otherworldly protagonist in that he is reincarnated as a sword! Beginning his quest by spawning in the middle of a beast-ridden forest, he encounters an injured gir...

episodes.title: Catgirl Meets Sword
episodes.plot: An man is killed and reincarnates in another world as a magical sword. As he is capable of telekinesis he is able to fly and learn skills by killing monsters. He decides to continue slaying monsters and become the most powerful sword in the world while waiting for his destined wielder. Elsewhere, a Black Cat Girl named Fran lives as an abused slave but dreams of greatness.

episodes.title: The Hellish Trial at the Adventurer's Guild
episodes.plot: In Alessa town at the Adventurers' Guild, Nell, a receptionist, informs Fran she must pass a battle simulation to join the Guild. The examiner is Donadrond, a powerful Oni.

episodes.title: The Arcane Blacksmith is Suspicious
episodes.plot: Garrus, a dwarf, invites Fran to his shop, explaining he is the famous Wandering Blacksmith of Granzell. After selling Fran enchanted armour, Garrus asks about Teacher. Teacher worries he is not as strong as other swords but Garrus reveals that what makes Teacher powerful is his ultra-high mana conductivity; the more magic Fran puts into him the more powerful he becomes.

episodes.title: A Goblin Stampede Is an Emergency
episodes.plot: Fran kills all the goblins present, saying she must become stronger. The next day, Klimt organizes a party to raid a dungeon.

episodes.title: A Perfect Dungeon Debut
episodes.plot: Fran and Teacher find the Goblin King and Queen, but kill them with one attack to their surprise. They realize the dungeon goes deeper and fight their way through a swarm of giant beetles. They enter a hidden door where they find the Dungeon Master.

episodes.title: The Greater Demon Was a Cheater
episodes.plot: Fran and Teacher continue to fight the Greater Demon. Teacher then remembers a Dungeon Master's summon cannot survive without him and tells Fran to aim her attacks at him.

episodes.title: The Vice Captain of the Knights is Annoying
episodes.plot: August Allsand, vice-captain of Alessa's knights, uses his skill Falsehood to identify Fran's lies. Teacher appraises him and finds he abuses his skills to falsely accuse commoners and charm his superiors. August then demands all the dungeon loot as a fine for Fran lying to a noble.

episodes.title: Blue Cats Are Enemies
episodes.plot: Fran reveals it was the Blue Cats who systematically made the Black Cats weaker and discriminated against over centuries. The Blue Cat, Gyuran, gleefully describes torturing and murdering Black Cats. Fran is afraid until Teacher reminds her she is not alone.

episodes.title: The A-Rank Adventurer Is a Monster
episodes.plot: Fran begins her investigation to the spider dungeon, which is also a promotion exam for two E-rank teams, Dragons Roar and Forest Eyes, overseen by the examiners Cruise, Rig and Eizelle.

episodes.title: The Trap of the Trap Spiders
episodes.plot: Amanda gives Fran combat and magic lessons while noting how unusual it is that Fran can use three elements. Deeper in the dungeon, the Trap Spiders have evolved into Trick Spiders with deadlier venom and greater strength and speed.

episodes.title: Summoning the Demon Wolf
episodes.plot: The Trickster Spider toys with Fran, Bart, and Victor by triggering booby traps on them. The party splits up to look for them while Amanda goes by herself while carrying Teacher. With little options, Teacher reveals he can speak and move to Amanda and summons an Onyx Wolf as a Familiar to try to find Fran.

episodes.title: Fran Is Looking Forward to a New Adventure
episodes.plot: After clearing the dungeon, Klimt gives Fran permission to go to Ulmutt and she is promoted. Garrus gives Fran new armor, and says he is going to Ulmutt too. Later, she says goodbye to everyone she met in Alessa.
